languages.text: "...Прошу меня простить, Лорд-капитан, но, похоже, "Обет Императора" уже обнаружил наше присутствие в системе и просит разрешение на вокс-передачу данных. Как прикажете поступить?"

traits.locale_text: "...Прошу меня простить, Лорд-капитан, но, похоже, "Обет Императора" уже обнаружил наше присутствие в системе и просит разрешение на вокс-передачу данных. Как прикажете поступить?"
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Lord Captain, I beg Your forgiveness, but it appears the Emperor's Vow has already detected our presence in the system and is requesting permission to initiate the data vox-transfer. What would you have me do?"
languages.original_text: "...Прошу меня простить, Лорд-капитан, но, похоже, "Обет Императора" уже обнаружил наше присутствие в системе и просит разрешение на вокс-передачу данных. Как прикажете поступить?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I beg forgiveness, but it appears the Oath of the Emperor has already detected our presence in the system and is requesting permission to initiate the vox-transfer of data. What would you have me do?"
traits.speaker: Player

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I beg Your forgiveness, but it appears the Emperor's Vow has already detected our presence in the system and is requesting permission to initiate the data vox-transfer. What would you have me do?"
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, je vous prie de me pardonner, mais le Serment de l'Empereur semble avoir déjà détecté notre présence dans le système et nous demande la permission de procéder à un transfert-vox de données. Que dois-je faire ? »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I beg Your forgiveness, but it appears the Emperor's Vow has already detected our presence in the system and is requesting permission to initiate the data vox-transfer. What would you have me do?"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, je vous prie de me pardonner, mais le Serment de l'Empereur semble avoir déjà détecté notre présence dans le système et nous demande la permission de procéder à un transfert-vox de données. Que dois-je faire ? »
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: “舰长大人，请您原谅，但帝皇誓约号似乎已经发现了我们，请求启动数据音阵传输。您希望我怎么做？”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I beg Your forgiveness, but it appears the Emperor's Vow has already detected our presence in the system and is requesting permission to initiate the data vox-transfer. What would you have me do?"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，请您原谅，但帝皇誓约号似乎已经发现了我们，请求启动数据音阵传输。您希望我怎么做？”
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Lord Captain, ich bitte um Vergebung, doch die Eid des Imperators hat unsere Anwesenheit im System offenbar schon registriert und erbittet Erlaubnis, den Daten-Voxtransfer einzuleiten. Was soll ich tun?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I beg Your forgiveness, but it appears the Emperor's Vow has already detected our presence in the system and is requesting permission to initiate the data vox-transfer. What would you have me do?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, ich bitte um Vergebung, doch die Eid des Imperators hat unsere Anwesenheit im System offenbar schon registriert und erbittet Erlaubnis, den Daten-Voxtransfer einzuleiten. Was soll ich tun?"
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, le pido que me disculpe, pero parece que el Voto del Emperador ya ha detectado nuestra presencia en el sistema y está solicitando permiso para iniciar la transferencia de datos por voco. ¿Qué quiere que haga?»
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I beg Your forgiveness, but it appears the Emperor's Vow has already detected our presence in the system and is requesting permission to initiate the data vox-transfer. What would you have me do?"

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, le pido que me disculpe, pero parece que el Voto del Emperador ya ha detectado nuestra presencia en el sistema y está solicitando permiso para iniciar la transferencia de datos por voco. ¿Qué quiere que haga?»
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、非礼をお詫び申し上げます。『皇帝の誓い』号は既に私たちの存在を惑星系内で検知し、データのヴォクス転送を開始する許可を要求しています。どうなさいますか？」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I beg Your forgiveness, but it appears the Emperor's Vow has already detected our presence in the system and is requesting permission to initiate the data vox-transfer. What would you have me do?"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、非礼をお詫び申し上げます。『皇帝の誓い』号は既に私たちの存在を惑星系内で検知し、データのヴォクス転送を開始する許可を要求しています。どうなさいますか？」
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, affınıza sığınarak İmparator'un Andı'nın sistemdeki varlığımızı tespit ettiğini ve voks aracılığıyla veri iletişimi başlatmak istediğini bildiririm. Emriniz nedir?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I beg Your forgiveness, but it appears the Emperor's Vow has already detected our presence in the system and is requesting permission to initiate the data vox-transfer. What would you have me do?"
